data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Of all the ways to travel, Dan prefers the train. Flying ____ faster, but ____ is ____ to ____ on ____. Also, Dan doesn't know ____ to ____ so ____ can't ____ a ____. Once he traveled by boat, but the movement made him feel sick.
data.partBlankContent: Of all the ways to travel, Dan prefers the train. Flying i_ faster, but h_ is sca___ to b_ on airp_____. Also, Dan doesn't know h__ to dr___ so h_ can't ta__ a c__. Once he traveled by boat, but the movement made him feel sick.
data.fullContent: Of all the ways to travel, Dan prefers the train. Flying is faster, but he is scared to be on airplanes. Also, Dan doesn't know how to drive so he can't take a car. Once he traveled by boat, but the movement made him feel sick.
data.answer: 在所有的旅行方式中，丹更喜欢坐火车。飞行更快，但他害怕在飞机上。而且，丹不知道怎么开车，所以他不能开车。有一次他乘船旅行，但船上的颠簸使他感到恶心。
